item.title: Bank Command Error
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:8, topic:220459”][quote author=chris lol link=topic=289484.msg2337561#msg2337561 date=1216179989]
you people are a disgrace to moparscape… all items on your char. bank, inv, equipped, everything. then save restart and try bank command again. if that doesn’t work delete the char it doesn’t work on and make a new one.
try the bank command on it.
[/quote]

I’ve got to say that that is one of the most ridiculous things i’ve ever heard. The command is based on player rights not names or specific accounts.[/quote]

Lmfao? Well said. Hes the disgrace. He doesn’t realise that he doesn’t have a clue about programming in java. Try learning java before you make comments like that…

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Command Error

try the bank command on it.[/quote]

I’ve got to say that that is one of the most ridiculous things i’ve ever heard. The command is based on player rights not names or specific accounts.

item.title: Bank Command Error

this is what mine says

public void openUpBank() { sendFrame248(5292, 5063); resetItems(5064); IsBanking = true; }

item.title: Bank Command Error
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

It’s not an error with the command. Open up your client.java and search “openUpBank()” until you actually find the method. then look through the code and see if it’s trying to open an incorrect interface, wether it has any invalid variables and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Command Error
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

that just changes the rights required to open the bank, but just to be sure i put it in and tried it… Still got D/C when i tried to ::bank the DOS window also filled up with a bunch of crap. Anyone have an idea on how to make it so i dont get DC when i try to use the ::bank command? or give me a new code for my client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Command Error
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

When ever I try to use the ::bank command, I get D/C. This is the code for my command in my client.java, tell me whats wrong with it.

else if (command.startsWith("bank") && playerRights >= 1) { openUpBank(); }

Read full topic
